Reference

All functions

bergeysAbstracts()

Fetch Bergeys abstracts This function fetches Kelly Eckenrode's and Jonathan Ye's scraping of the Bergey's abstracts and returns a tidy data.frame

checkColumnValues()

Check column values

checkColumnValuesDF()

Check column values in a data frame

checkColumnValuesList()

Check column values in a list of bugphyzz datasets

checkRequiredColumns()

Check required columns in a single bugphyzz dataset

checkRequiredColumnsList()

Check required columns across a list of bugphyzz datasets

curationLinks()

Show links to curation spreadsheets

customLinks()

Custom Links

.attributes()

Print valid attributes

.stop_custom()

Custom function for helping generate stop conditions in the bugphyzz package

.stop_invalid_column_class()

Stop condition for invalid column class (in Attribute_value column)

.stop_invalid_column_values()

Stop condition for invalid values in a column of a bugphyzz dataset

.stop_required_columns_misplaced()

Stop condition for misplaced required columns in a bugphyzz dataset

.stop_required_columns_missing()

Stop condition for missing required columns in a bugphyzz dataset

.stop_uncatalogued_column()

Stop condition for a column not catalogued in the template file

.template()

Generate a template for a bugphyzz dataset

fattyAcidComposition()

Function for shaping fatty acid composition from Google Sheets using tidyR

makeSignatures()

Make signatures

ncbiRank()

Get Taxonomy Ranks from NCBI Taxonomy IDs

physiologies()

Fetch physiological data

physiologiesList()

List of available physiologies

requiredColumns()

Required columns
